title: Everyone & Fancy Ham
description: Comedian Hari Kondabolu joins Emma Choi to solve a meat mystery with bestselling author Gillian Flynn, then we talk with baseball legend Sean Doolittle about what he and Emma's mom have in common.

itunes:title: Everyone & Fancy Ham
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Emma Choi talks with Gillian Flynn and Sean Doolitle. She is joined by comedian Hari Kondabolu.
itunes:subtitle: Emma Choi talks with Gillian Flynn and Sean Doolitle. She is joined by comedian Hari Kondabolu.
content:encoded: Comedian Hari Kondabolu joins Emma Choi to solve a meat mystery with bestselling author Gillian Flynn, then we talk with baseball legend Sean Doolittle about what he and Emma's mom have in common.
